page.title: 18Brownies in Calne.
page.content: My name is Diane Lean.I belong to the 4th Calne pack of Brownies,which is like a club.We do lots of things, like leaf collecting,and learning how to use a telephone box. I go to meetings every week.There are four groups of six girls.The sixth in line is called a seconder,the first is a sixer.That's what I am.The groups are called Imps,Sprites,Gnomes and Elves.I am an Imp. I am working for my Animal Lovers Badge.I have to look after my pet budgerigar properly for three months. You can win lots of other badges too like the Venture Badge.We leave the Brownies when we are ten and go on to the Girl Guides. Our uniform is a brown dress with badges we have won sewn on,yellow neck tie with silver badge,belt and bobble hat.
